page.title: 11A child's Monday
page.content: I got up in the morning watch Breakfast TV and then get dressed. I have my breakfast which is usually toast and peanut butter and cereal and a drink of either tea or orange juice. I clean my teeth pack my bag and go out to catch the bus. The bus takes me to school. We stop several times to pick up children from other villages. I copy my spelling, have maths and then a break. I come in for English and then it is dinner break. I take my own lunch which consists of sandwiches, crisps, cake or buscuits. Our headmaster takes us for craft and we make such things as masks, carved wooden objects and papier mache models. We break for 15 minutes and come in for a story. We go hom, play out and come in for tea. We go out again in the summer,then bath, watch TV for a while and go to bed.
